title: Cop- Android Wear Phone Finder
summary: Cop phone finder for Android wear: get a remote glimpse of your phone location
description: Cop is your Android wearable phone finder buddy.Forgotten where's your phone? Just start Cop from your android wearable, and your phone will ring & flashlight like a police raid storming your place!!Cop will also trigger remotely the camera of your phone, and stream the video directly on your wrist, so that you can see exactly what your phone camera sees, and easily find back your phone - How cool is that!Works on android wearable watches (Moto360, Samsung Gear Live, LG G Watch etc..) untill you stay in the Bluetooth range perimeter of your phone, which should be Android 4.3+ to use the app****************************************************************************************************************************#Licenses and CreditsThis program is free* software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License V3 as published by the Free Software Foundation. This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful but WITHOUT ANY REFUND AND ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License V3 for more details: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.htmlThe codebase we started this project on it that one: https://github.com/WatchfaceArt/wearcameraspymode, and our own sources are availlable on demand through developper's contacts can find in this playstore page.The third party content used for this app is also quoted herunder: - Audio asset          . https://www.freesound.org/people/ikbenraar/sounds/135720/ - Graphic assets          . http://openclipart.org/detail/79399/radar-by-mola          . http://openclipart.org/detail/171805/police-cap-by-solvera-171805          . http://openclipart.org/detail/191399/smartphone-by-agomjo-191399          . http://openclipart.org/detail/166028/volume-level-3-by-mightyman-166028          . https://openclipart.org/detail/40477/explosion-by-cybergedeon          . https://openclipart.org/detail/27579/pointing-hand-by-tom          . https://openclipart.org/detail/27060/police-car-light-bar-by-roba
descriptionHTML:
Cop is your Android wearable phone finder buddy.

Forgotten where's your phone? Just start Cop from your android wearable, and your phone will ring & flashlight like a police raid storming your place!!

Cop will also trigger remotely the camera of your phone, and stream the video directly on your wrist, so that you can see exactly what your phone camera sees, and easily find back your phone - How cool is that!


Works on android wearable watches (Moto360, Samsung Gear Live, LG G Watch etc..) untill you stay in the Bluetooth range perimeter of your phone, which should be Android 4.3+ to use the app

The codebase we started this project on it that one: https://github.com/WatchfaceArt/wearcameraspymode, and our own sources are availlable on demand through developper's contacts can find in this playstore page.
The third party content used for this app is also quoted herunder:
